backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing products in a map with CRUD-like queries and helpers for sorting and grouping by brand.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing brandingâ€‘related changes, affected frontend files, and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file and component.
frontend/.env: Defines environment variables for the app name and slug used in centralized branding.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens defining light/dark themes and layout primitives.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the TorqueShine Supply title and metadata and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component orchestrating layout, setting document title, and rendering product sections based on backend data.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Shows an about section using centralized branding with descriptive text and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/BrandSection.tsx: Renders a header and product grid for a specific brand using ProductCard components.
frontend/src/components/BrandsSection.ts: Displays informational cards describing featured brands Turtle Wax and 3M.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable alert component for displaying errors or empty product states.
frontend/src/components/HomeHero.tsx: Hero banner with headline, description, and a styled image introducing the product catalog.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image, name, short description, and tag badges.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with dynamic year, branding text, and a caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides a sticky header with branding and responsive navigation including mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines centralized branding values including app name, slug, and tagline.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, refreshing queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, login, and identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches product data from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom color theme using OKLCH variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, containers, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, implemented features, and requirements tracking info.
